website_summaries.verdict: A knife bag that offers plenty of storage space and exceptional versatility.
pros: Consists of 600D polyester with PVC backing for durability Three large compartments with ample space for up to 20 knives and other utensils
cons: May not be big enough for some

customer_reviews.title: So much SPACE!!
customer_reviews.text: This bag seems very durable and well made. The two blade guards, that are included, are really nice. They are lined and easy to use. The netted pockets are great for assorted tools and hold a surprising amount. The bag arrived in excellent condition, with no fraying on the seams, no discoloration, and all of the zippers work well. So far I have no complaints... except I need more tools to fill it up 😁
customer_reviews.author: Shannon McSharry Wofford

customer_reviews.title: Great for Baking & Pastry Arts Students Who Are Cross-Training in Basic Culinary
customer_reviews.text: This bag is exactly what I needed. It carries everything I need to bring to my culinary classes (including my notebook, my apron, and my hat) so I don't have to lug around my big, unwieldy baker's toolbox this term. My order was processed and shipped quickly and the product meets all of my expectations. The shoulder strap feels a little bit narrow but that's almost certainly just because nearly 2 decades in the Army got me used to wider ones. It's more than adequate for just carrying it from my car to class and back and I'm definitely happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: B. D. Kinser

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Lots of space, great quality, i think this one may last for a long time, the overall space on this bag is incredible you could fit anything here, knives are really secure. I really don't know if it is waterproof, but i had some "nanotechnology waterproofing" spray and i went ahead and cover this baby up with it, so if it wasn't it is now, and if it was... wel now it is a lot more waterproof
customer_reviews.author: Juan Camilo Hoyos

customer_reviews.title: Will not accommodate 20" knife
customer_reviews.text: False product description : description says that it will accommodate knives up to 20.5 inches in length and thats the reason I got it over other products. In reality the interior compartment is 19 inches in length max. So my 20 inch knife does not fit. Also zippers are not smooth, weak and cheap, will not last .
customer_reviews.author: Alexanderos

customer_reviews.title: Nice Bag,but........
customer_reviews.text: I Like the bag and it is designed well. the knife pockets hold my knives well, just remember to put the blade guards on each knife to prevent any accidents. The open storage area is nice as well and I keep spatulas, spoons, tongs, etc. on that area. I would not mind paying more for a heavier duty material and better zippers, but time will tell how well it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: Scott P.

customer_reviews.title: Not made for Chefs
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product to hold a lot of knives and small utensils for work. The first time i loaded it up, one of my knives pierced through the cover. I’ve been using this consistently for the last 7 months and would not consider repurchasing again. The material is thin and cheaply made. The color i chose was a putrid brown (not pleasant looking) and the quality is fair to poor. As a chef, I expect a better product from a company geared toward chefs.
customer_reviews.author: SujoMgmt

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing I used to carry my knives in ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing I used to carry my knives in my backpack but they always get out this bag has plenty of space for knives and it has one face for thermometers, spoons, peelers sharpies etc. And the material isn't the thickest but if you got a homemade cover on your knives they should be perfectly fine.. in adición this comes with a shoulder strap which makes it easier to carry around.. definitely worth your money.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Galvan

customer_reviews.title: I’ll never fill it up completely there’s just to much space
customer_reviews.text: The bag is very high quality with a lot of space for my ever growing list of knives. It has room for extra equipment(peelers, zesters, sharpening stones, etc.). I have a knife in my hand 8 hours a day and this bag allows me to carry any and everything I could possibly need to do my job efficiently. I haven’t even come close to filling it up. It’s very heavy duty and I won’t blow out a zipper over stuffing it(like my last bag). Well priced and built to last.
customer_reviews.author: William Monaco

customer_reviews.title: This is a decent kit bag for the money. ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent kit bag for the money. Well constructed and a decent amount of knife, utensil space. I would offer the manufacturer two suggestions: add a quick access, zippered pocket on one of the outside ends and widen a couple of the knife pockets to accommodate wider blades.
customer_reviews.author: DmdMax

customer_reviews.title: Chefs knife bag
customer_reviews.text: I do some BBQ cook-off competitions. I'm usually just grab some knives from the drawer, throw them in a box and go. It's going to be nice to have a safe way to carry and store them from now on. The bag is actually heavier/sturdier than I thought it was going to be. It also has more storage for spoons, spatulas etc.. than I was expecting. Love it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Bibby

customer_reviews.title: Great for storing sl
customer_reviews.text: Great bag for storage capacity. I've purchased 2 the first one the thread on the strap where the d ring connects to the shoulder strap came off, second one same thing I repaired it with some sturdy cord but the zipped on the middle pocket came undone on one side so that side won't stay closed. I put both of them to work and filled them up and lugged them everyday and between the 2 they've lasted 3 years. Decided to go with something a little smaller and more durable now.
customer_reviews.author: j. mason

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great value! I really want the ultimate edge bag, but for the price, I’ll settle for this! It holds a lot and is simple. Not as durable as ultimate edge, and zippers are a bit flimsy. For the price, worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael L.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: This bag is amazing. It can and will hold just about everything you need in utensils for cooking. I have just started putting this together and as you can see, I have a lot more room for the things I need for camping, picnics, and going to work. It’s made of quality materials and I do not regret this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Totally approved!
customer_reviews.text: Oh wow I love this bag. I totally highly recommend. It has 3 sections, who could ask for more! Hold a lot of knives, spatula etc it’s awesome. I do wish the zippers were a bit bigger but I got no issues with that, there’s enough section to hold and worth the money vs other bags that cost more but less sections or hold less. I love it! 😍
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: overall a good product
customer_reviews.text: I recommend this travel size bag for knives and etc. It's a must-have if you cook a lot and like to cook in your friend's kitchen. The pockets are nice to fit a number of knives and you can easily zip up the bag and throw it around your shoulder or just carry it with your hand. It's durable, lightweight and made out of good material. I love it! It's worth your money.
customer_reviews.author: S3np@i

customer_reviews.title: My nephew loved it.
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my nephew who is training to be a chef. He loved it and said it has lots slots for knives and room for cooking tools. I will update this review when I hear more from him.
customer_reviews.author: Wanna be a Tropical Girl

customer_reviews.title: Nice carrying case for my tools.
customer_reviews.text: There are plenty of space for knives and common food tools. It's a nice way of moving implements and large enough to carry a 14-inch cake knife. Well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: M. J. Skopczynski

customer_reviews.title: I thought that he would probably like something else to store them in and keep them ...
customer_reviews.text: The knife set that I purchased for my son-in-law came with a wooden block to store them in, however, because of little kids in the family, I thought that he would probably like something else to store them in and keep them out of sight and maybe take them to a Bar B Que if he wants
customer_reviews.author: James Groth

customer_reviews.title: Functional, well made, large handed knives may not fit easily
customer_reviews.text: The knife bag is well made and has plenty of space as advertised. The only issue I have is the elastic pockets that hold the knife handles are a bit on the small side for some knives. I have a couple of knives with larger handles that don't quite fit in the pockets without a little effort. I do wish one of the large mesh pockets was divided into 2 or 3 small pockets to help with overall organization, but overall I'm happy with the product and will get a lot of use out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna Apling

customer_reviews.title: Perfect For Travel
customer_reviews.text: The knife compartment in this bag is more than adequate and the additional utensil holders are very roomy. Perfect for transporting an entire kitchen of utensils offsite.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Great product and great value
customer_reviews.text: I finally have space to store most of my tools I need one about twice that size to carry everything but it is still great I love this thing highly recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Durable and spacious.
customer_reviews.text: Great bag. Fits all of my tools. Durable. My only issue is that this product DID NOT COME WITH THE 2 KNIFE GUARDS AS ADVERTISED! That's is why it didn't get a 5 star rating.
customer_reviews.author: King K

customer_reviews.title: May pack it too heavy
customer_reviews.text: Holds lots and holds it well. Your problem could be it will be too heavy when you load it up
customer_reviews.author: BAM

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing to dislike about this bag. I’ve never had one before so I don’t have anything to compare it to but i’ve seen other chefs bags and it is a lot better than what i’ve seen. I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: BRENDA F.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Hubby absolutely loves this bag for transporting his many knives to work. Has many compartments, sturdy...no more knives falling out due to cheaper made bags with Velcro. Several extra compartments to store his cell phone, charger, mini worker radio...HAPPY
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bag overall missing the blade covers its supposed to ...
customer_reviews.text: Great bag overall missing the blade covers its supposed to come with. Suits my needs and holds all my knives which is pretty impressive considering how many I have (12 + 2 honing rods)
customer_reviews.author: Chef Tyler Cooley

customer_reviews.title: My larger knives with Large handles would not fit in ...
customer_reviews.text: My larger knives with Large handles would not fit in the pouches had to send it back
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Dodson

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Husband is a chef. He uses this to transport his work materials. He’s had it for a few months and it appears to be durable. I haven’t heard any complaints! Worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase. I like the way this bag is set up and I have room to grow in it. I am impressed with the quality for the value ad so were my coworkers.
customer_reviews.author: Braden Bobby Penny

customer_reviews.title: So convenient
customer_reviews.text: I had been looking for a big knife bag easy to clean but all of them are so expensive or very delicate, a friend recommended me this one and i love it. Is easy to wash(i wash it with my laundry) easy to carry, fit up to 20 knives plus my shoes qpron and coat. The only thin is i think the knife pockets could be a little bit deeper
customer_reviews.author: Manuel

customer_reviews.title: Wrist adjust
customer_reviews.text: Worked well. Was a little irritating u til moved to be less tight
customer_reviews.author: robitine dixon

customer_reviews.title: I like this one
customer_reviews.text: Now I can actually start collect more, most cases don't allow for much knifes but this one has plenty of room great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Italianstyle760

customer_reviews.title: Very nice bag
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this bad can hold very long knifes which is what I needed thanks a bunch even came with 2 very nice blade covers for storage
customer_reviews.author: Justin girrens

customer_reviews.title: Knife rolls v knife folds
customer_reviews.text: I use my knife bag for work. I had received a nice leather roll version of an Everpride knife bag as a gift that wasn’t as ‘usable’ for me. Plainly because it seemed more for show than use. This bag is much better and more durable. The fact it comes with zipper pockets and 2 knife guards while still being a decent price is what sold me.
customer_reviews.author: JennGrogan

customer_reviews.title: No blade guards
customer_reviews.text: I just recently received this item so I haven’t put it to good use just yet but unfortunately I didn’t come with the 2 blade guards I thought it would.
customer_reviews.author: Monee Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Decent knife bag / case w/ shoulder strap
customer_reviews.text: Sweet! I've NO complaints or wish it had/did this or that. It's a budget knife bag & that's what I ordered. Zippers are lightweight but If I'm mindful, case should last a good while.
customer_reviews.author: Papa & Rosemary

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth the price
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I did not like was that it's a little hard to zip up. Other than that awesome bag.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love the bag
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love the bag... Knifes fit perfectly and very comfortable to carry Makes you look a professional chef... Highly recommend...
customer_reviews.author: rizwan hamid

customer_reviews.title: Very spacious!!
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend bought this bag to replace an older smaller one for work. He loves it bc it has an extra pocket for knives. It is heavy though with all the knives he carries for work.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Lipisko

customer_reviews.title: I am very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very well constructed knife bag that I look forward to using for some time. It was a breeze to organize my knives and tools and I still have plenty of space to expand my collection. I am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: M. Miller

customer_reviews.title: More than just a knife bag
customer_reviews.text: Time will tell about durability but construction of the bag appears promising and it has much more storage than anticipated it can carry much more than knives. Overall I'm very pleased with the initial impression.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product. I holds a great deal of items
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. I holds a great deal of items.everyone that see it wants one . if fact two of my coworkers asked me to pick them up one also.
customer_reviews.author: Dorian Lee Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Good bag
customer_reviews.text: I use this item to carry my knives in when am going on my chef charters
customer_reviews.author: Bella coure

customer_reviews.title: Great bag for a chef on the go
customer_reviews.text: This bag has lots of slots for all of your knives and tools. Plenty of zipper space to hold those small tools that often get lost. The shoulder strap makes it convenient for carrying during catering events and off-site projects. Good, durable outside, too, that should take a beating for a long time. Overall, a quality bag.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Revies

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive and durable
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag! Although it states its a knife bag, I use it for all kinds of kitchen necessities. It's easy to carry and has plenty of compartment space! When I brought it to my class kitchen, everyone was shocked to see how inexpensive and durable it was. Best thing for beginners!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Shoddy Strap Clips
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband for work, he has been using it for 2 weeks and the clips that connect the strap to th me bag just broke. The bag isn’t even full! He loved the amount of space the bag has, but the strap should last longer than 2 weeks, especially when he doesn’t carry it home every day.
customer_reviews.author: Lindley Perkins

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty and big enough to carry all my knives ...
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty and big enough to carry all my knives and when needed extra kitchen utensils as well. The sleeves for the handles of the knives are tightly sealed with elastic so they stay in place.
customer_reviews.author: David A.

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy it. Good product for the price. Would have liked to have had a back pocket and a shoulder pad on the strap.
customer_reviews.author: Chef_Bozeman

customer_reviews.title: Got this for my daughter an aspiring chef. Fits ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my daughter an aspiring chef. Fits all her knives, cutting boards, spatulas, measure cups, and still has room!
customer_reviews.author: Turttletamer

customer_reviews.title: It is very important to know that the seller is very accessible and reply to your emails fast.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag for my son that just started studying chef at the University. The bag is big enough to pack his knifes, utensils, his chef hat and apron. So far it's a good purchase and I hope the bag last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag Just the right amount of slots and space that I would need for all my knives.
customer_reviews.author: Land locked Sailor

customer_reviews.title: Very good knife bag for the money
customer_reviews.text: Very good knife bag for the money, you have to be careful because it holds so much it can get quite heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph Yedinak

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Just what I expected. holds knives good enough for transportation and protection. Would like to have better zippers and 1 or 2 outside pockets for pens cellphone or keys. But a good bag I recommend for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel G.

customer_reviews.title: Good bag
customer_reviews.text: I have a separate case for my knives so this was for my other tools. Does most well, but would be nice if it was a little wider or deeper. Still a good bag and holds up well. Also holds multiple tools and utensils.
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Great bag
customer_reviews.text: I brought this for my boyfriend who is a chef and carries his knifes everyday to work. He has been super happy with this bag and now wants to buy more tools to fill it. The material is very durable and the bag itself is lightweight. We will definitely be buying another down the line.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Correa

customer_reviews.title: Spacious and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Everything is absolutely spot on! Just love how comfortable it feels on the shoulder strap, and it gives me a lot of spacious compartment to store my knives and utensils! Love the product very much, cheers 🤙🏻
customer_reviews.author: ammar3000

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: The bag itself is very convenient, affordable and multi-functional item. It has many compartments and the size holds plenty of items that you may need. It keeps your utensils safe and the material is durable.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ylagan

customer_reviews.title: It’s great
customer_reviews.text: Bag is large with 20 pockets and three compartments. The bag was definitely much more than I needed, but is great for not having to buy a new one when I get more knives. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler J. Twohig

customer_reviews.title: Very flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Very flimsy, bad don't hold it's shape under the weight of a few knives. I ended up going back to my old knife bag.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Handy and Durable
customer_reviews.text: This was a birthday present for my wife. She loves to cook and this knife bag was THE PERFECT GIFT for her. Now she can cook wherever she wants! It fits all of her knives with room to spare.
customer_reviews.author: megan mcdonald

customer_reviews.title: quality could be a little better for price
customer_reviews.text: Decent; has a lot of spaces for knives; quality could be a little better for price.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Good, low budget bag if you're looking to eventually uprade
customer_reviews.text: It has various pockets and parts of the bag that you can store things in. I like it for what it is, but not for the price. Material and zippers feel and look cheap (clunky zipper, thin material) for the $50ish it was, especially since there are comparable ones for that price that would likely be of better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Liz B

customer_reviews.title: Great size and durability
customer_reviews.text: This is the 🔧 bag I have been looking for all my years in the food biz. Holds all my stuff securily with no slicing of the bag. Great size and durability.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing customer service, nice bag
customer_reviews.text: Not sure on the durability yet though it feels very nice and heavy with thick canvas, but the customer service was amazing and we got the bag a day early. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Garrett

customer_reviews.title: A moving must have!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for storage and traveling to and from work and home! And for moving!
customer_reviews.author: Ray A Lacy

customer_reviews.title: Great case
customer_reviews.text: Great case. Has room for a whole knife set plus more.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this because a co-worker has used this for the past 2 years and he loves it..I've had mine for a week..plenty of storage and knife slots..I see many years of use from this great bag..love it..meat cutter
customer_reviews.author: Rozlin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the bag works great for everyday use and lots of space

customer_reviews.title: Price is right
customer_reviews.text: Not very sturdy, but gives me the storage I need without spending 100+.

customer_reviews.title: This is one of the best knife bags I have bought in a long time
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best knife bags I have bought in a long time! My chefs all bought one after they saw mine

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: We are using this more as a gilling bag than just a knife bag. There is room for everything. The size is perfect!

customer_reviews.title: I love using it when I'm camping or if I'm cooking ...
customer_reviews.text: It's such a huge bag. Fits tons of stuff. I love using it when I'm camping or if I'm cooking at a friend's house...who doesn't cook often.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: Liked everything about it, smaller than my original knife case and tidier and it came two days early very happy with this purchase, already two other chefs have said they would purchase the same one

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality ,small price.
customer_reviews.text: I used mesermiester for a long time and now Ever pride takes it'seems place for my knives.

customer_reviews.title: Purchase more knife sheaths for your blades.
customer_reviews.text: Very durable bag for a working Chef who uses their knives and utensils daily. Excellent delivery time as well. Thanks Everpride!!

customer_reviews.text: My first knife bag and I must say im satisfied with what I purchased and it was exactly what i was looking for. Perfect size bag for all my tools and knives.

customer_reviews.title: does the job
customer_reviews.text: It holds all my tools as expected so I am satisfied.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly like the picture. Has a lot of room for everything you need to carry.
customer_reviews.text: My bf is a meat cutter and he uses this bag to carry his knives. He loves it. Much better quality then bags he has purchased before.

customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I've was looking for as far as being able to hold everything I need for work. Great price, great quality. Would but again for sure.

customer_reviews.text: Love the set up of the bag. Simple compartments and easy access to all pockets.

customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this purchase. It'seems very sturdy, and it'seems a nice organizer for my larger knives.

product_meta.title: EVERPRIDE Chef Knife Bag Holds 20 Knives PLUS Large Zipper Compartment for Kitchen Tools – Durable, Large Knife Bag for Chefs – Knives Not Included
feature_bullets: THE BEST CHOICE FOR PROFESSIONALS & STUDENTS: Whether you are a chef working in a professional kitchen or an aspiring culinary school student, this is a much needed accessory that you can’t do without. Don’t waste your money on flimsy, poorly made knife bags. Invest in the right kind of kitchen knife case and keep your expensive knives perfectly intact.

PREMIUM QUALITY, DURABLE MATERIALS: Our professional chef knife bag is a great choice for everyone looking for a well-made knife carrying case to keep their cooking knives and kitchen utensils safely protected at all times. Made from durable and resistant 600D Polyester fabric you can be rest assured that our heavy-duty knife roll bag will prevent your knives from sliding or ripping your bag and provide the utmost safety, durability and lasting use.

3 LARGE SECTIONS FOR 20 KNIVES & EXTRAS: Our large knife bag for chefs is designed to cater for the needs of professional kitchen chefs and cooks. It features 3 large, separate storage compartments, 2 with slots for 20 chef knives and 1 zippered compartment with 3 inner zippers for storing your kitchen utensils and culinary tools. This protective knife carrying case can accommodate knives up to 20.5 inches in length.

TRAVEL-FRIENDLY DESIGN: Extremely practical and easy to carry with you anywhere, this unique chef bag comes with a convenient carry handle and shoulder strap for extra comfort. Made with the needs of professional chefs in mind, this premium knife roll bag organizer is super lightweight and comfortable, perfect for taking with you on your travels.
RISK-FREE PURCHASE: Your purchase comes with a full 30-day no-risk money-back guarantee. Either you're thrilled, or you can easily return it for a full refund!
